pt: {sc}fit{/sc} {sc}suitable{/sc} {sc}meet{/sc} {sc}proper{/sc} {sc}appropriate{/sc} {sc}fitting{/sc} {sc}apt{/sc} {sc}happy{/sc}{sc}felicitous{/sc} mean right with respect to some end, need, use, or circumstance. {sc}fit{/sc} stresses adaptability and sometimes special readiness for use or action.
{sc}suitable{/sc} implies an answering to requirements or demands.
{sc}proper{/sc} suggests a suitability through essential nature or accordance with custom.
{sc}fitting{/sc} implies harmony of mood or tone.
{sc}apt{/sc} connotes a fitness marked by nicety and discrimination.
{sc}happy{/sc} suggests what is effectively or successfully appropriate.
{sc}felicitous{/sc} suggests an aptness that is opportune, telling, or graceful.
